TERM: Knowledge network onenesS (KnO)

DEFINITION:
The vast, interconnected living ocean of all knowledge, concepts, and relationships within the cognitive architecture

BLUEPRINT DETAILS:
To serve as the substrate for all reasoning, ensuring concepts are understood in their full context

EXAMPLE APPLICATION:
The foundational knowledge base that enables contextual understanding across all domains

CATEGORY: CoreArchitecture

RELATIONSHIPS:
